name: Ascension Media Group LLP
tag_list: seis, enterprise-investment-scheme, seed, early-stage, growth, media, entertainment, creative-industries, digital-media, technology
overview: Ascension Media Group is a London based ventures firm specialising in the creative industries and related digital technology. The firm believes that it is impossible to navigate the landscape in the creative industries without an understanding of the road maps in technology. Ascension Ventures, the investment management arm, manages investment funds making seed, early stage and growth investments in the firm’s sectors of specialism. Ascension Media, the firm’s services arm, specialises in strategy, operations, marketing and commercialisation and financial management of intellectual property rights.
